about: Ubuntu 23.04 ‘Lunar Lobster’ was released on Thursday April 20, 2023. This is the 38th release of Ubuntu desktop. As a short-term release, Lunar gets 9 months of ongoing updates, security patches, and critical fixes. Ubuntu 23.04 includes a new OS installer, GNOME 44, new features in many of the included panels, and new versions of its core software set, including Mozilla Firefox 111, Thunderbird 102, LibreOffice 7.5, and Shotwell 0.
history: Ubuntu was first released on October 20, 2004. The most recent version, Ubuntu 23.04 ‘Lunar Lobster’, was released on April 20, 2023.
influence: Ubuntu is heavily influenced by the Debian project. The most recent version, Ubuntu 23.04, includes a range of features from the GNOME project, including GNOME 44, and other open-source software.
